meanings.definition: things understood by or meant for a select few
meanings.sent1: The professor's collection of esoterica fascinated his students.
meanings.sent2: She delved into the world of esoterica to uncover hidden truths.
meanings.sent3: The group's obsession with esoterica made them seem like secret agents.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of esoterica was a key that unlocked many mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The library held a treasure trove of esoterica waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: obscure or specialized knowledge or interest
meanings.sent1: Her passion for esoterica led her to study ancient texts.
meanings.sent2: The bookshop had a section dedicated to esoterica for enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The detective's esoterica about rare gemstones helped solve the case.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her esoterica on vintage styles set her apart.
meanings.sent5: The professor's lecture on esoterica sparked curiosity among the students.
